content: As an AI Language model, I don't have access to current pricing information, but generally speaking, Saas-Fee and Arosa tend to be on the more affordable side compared to some of the other resorts in Switzerland. However, prices can vary significantly depending on factors such as the time of year, the type of accommodation, and the level of ski instruction required. It's always best to do some research and compare prices across different resorts to find the best deal for your family.
